title: Catullus 64 - what do we learn in lines 8-9

content.prompt: In lines 8-9 (<u>Praeterea</u> . . . <u>undis</u>), we learn that the island

choices.label: offers little to eat because of the high waters
is uninhabited and offers no means of escape
lies open to the searing heat of the Sun
is being submerged by the rising waves

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
